title: Toolbox IPC Base message
description: The base type for toolbox IPC messages

source.description: The endpoint that sent the message

destination.description: The endpoint that the message is intended for

timestamp.description: The UNIX timestamp when the message was sent

user.description: The login name of the sender

data.description: The base64 encoded content of the message

signature.description: The base64 encoded signature of the encoded data
